about_the_game:
After watching the first video, the last level is loaded. Sorry for this bug. To avoid this, you need to press the E button during the video. Then the correct level will be loaded.

Planet B24 is a first-person horror quest. In this game, you are abducted by aliens to put their terrible experiments on you. You have to solve puzzles and escape from the aliens so that they do not catch you. Get out of this damn planet to return to planet Earth.

In a dark first-person game and horror quest genre, you have to escape from the planet to which you were kidnapped by aliens. People decided to record a video in which they talk about themselves and their planet. But they didn't know that those who watch this video are not friendly. The video fell into the hands of the aliens and they decide to kidnap one of the people in order to experiment on him. But our hero is not a mistake, and he decides to escape from the aliens. He succeeds with great difficulty, since the aliens are also awake. They always keep an eye on the camera.

UNIQUE WORLD

In the new game Planet B24, you are removed to a distant planet, where beauty and danger are inseparable. Run away from evil aliens in beautiful places.

DISCOVER A MEMORABLE HISTORY

Dive into the dark side of alien nature and meet charismatic characters and a unique story.


ADVANCED GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY

Planet B24 has very beautiful graphics and catchy gameplay!

name: Planet B24

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or Windows 8.1 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Planet B24 is a first-person horror quest. In this game, you are abducted by aliens to put their terrible experiments on you. You have to solve puzzles and escape from the aliens so that they do not catch you. Get out of this damn planet to return to planet Earth.
